mapper.select: SELECT C.CUST_NICK, C.CUST_IMG FROM TB_BOARD B INNER JOIN TB_APPLY A ON B.BOARD_ID = A.BOARD_ID INNER JOIN TB_CUST C ON A.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID WHERE B.BOARD_ID = #{board_id} AND A.APPROVE_YN = 'Y';

SELECT C.CUST_NICK, C.CUST_IMG, C.CUST_ID FROM TB_BOARD B INNER JOIN TB_APPLY A ON B.BOARD_ID = A.BOARD_ID INNER JOIN TB_CUST C ON A.CUST_ID = C.CUST_ID WHERE B.BOARD_ID = #{board_id} AND A.APPROVE_YN = 'N' ;
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_APPLY SET APPROVE_YN='Y' WHERE BOARD_ID = #{board_id} AND CUST_ID = #{cust_id};
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TB_APPLY WHERE BOARD_ID = #{board_id} AND CUST_ID = #{cust_id};
